title: Strengthening Customer Service Competency in Practice: Self-Directed Online Pediatric Bladder Health Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: After completing at least 80% of the online modules, learners will be able to explain four or more self-management techniques related to bladder health.
By achieving over 85% in VR simulation assessment missions, learners will develop action plans for behavioral changes applicable to real-life contexts.

In comprehensive evaluations conducted at four-week intervals, learners will demonstrate a 20% improvement in bladder health knowledge scores and submit parental observation reports confirming child self-efficacy of over 70%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
